questions.question: What is the dominant color of the container's label?
What is the overall shape of the product container?
What material appears to be used for the product container?
What is the primary text displayed prominently on the container?
What kind of information is detailed in the central section of the label?
What is the most visible brand or company name on the product?
Is there any texture evident on the visible surface of the container?
What is the color of the smaller text on the label, compared to the main text?
What kind of graphic design elements are used on the label besides text?
Does the container have a lid or seal visible in the image?
What is the overall style of the product packaging design?
Are there any noticeable images or icons displayed on the packaging?
What is the approximate weight or serving size indicated on the label?
What type of units are used to describe the serving size on the label?
Is there any information about allergens clearly visible on the label?
